Ensure that the passport is valid.

 Apply for your Canadian Visa, work or study permit in
 your home country.

 Original copies of all your documents.

 Find temporary or permanent accommodation.

 Temporary accommodation is necessary when you first
 arrive. You need a place to stay for few days till you find 
 a permanent place to live. If you have already found a
 permanent place to live then keep 1 or 2 copies of the
 lease 

 Temporary accommodation can be found on air bnb,
 book hotel.If sharing the place find roommates.

 You can find roommates in different groups made by the 
 previous students on Facebook.

 Pack Clothes for all types of weather.

 Check in which term you are coming Fall or winter, and
 accordingly wear clothes while travelling and bring all other
 clothes.\ 
 Book tickets in advance and check for luggage weight
 restrictions of the airline.

 Check different websites before for comparing prices, also
 check airline websites as sometimes they c an offer better
 deal.
 Register for your courses
 Register your course as soon as the registration opens
 because the seats in each course are filled in a blink on eye
 and you might end up being registered in courses that you
